


Partial Eta-Squared for Factor A: 
```{r, echo=FALSE, fig.height=6}
# Partical Eta Squared Calculation for Factor A and B. 
# 0.01 to 0.06 = small     
# 0.06 to 0.14 = medium   
# > 0.14 = large effect size 


SS<-summary(res_aov)[[1]][["Sum Sq"]]
SS_A = SS[1]/(SS[1] + SS[3])
knitr::kable(SS_A, digits = 2, format = "html", table.attr = "class=\"anovatab\"")

if (SS_A<=0.06){
  cat("Small Effect Size for Factor A!\n")
}else if (0.14>=SS_A & SS_A>0.06){
  cat("Medium Effect Size for Factor A!\n")
}else {
  cat("Large Effect Size for Factor A!\n")
}

```

Partial Eta-Squared for Factor B: 
```{r, echo=FALSE, fig.height=6}
SS_B = SS[2]/(SS[2] + SS[3])
knitr::kable(SS_B, digits = 2, format = "html", table.attr = "class=\"anovatab\"")

if (SS_B<=0.06){
  cat("Small Effect Size for Factor B!\n")
}else if (0.14>=SS_B & SS_B>0.06){
  cat("Medium Effect Size for Factor B!\n")
}else {
  cat("Large Effect Size for Factor B!\n")
}

```
